Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute near Kedzie/36th
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses temp. rerouted NB: Kedzie, 39th, California, I-55 Exp & Kedzie; SB:  Kedzie, 36th, California & 39th: due to, street blockage near Kedzie/36th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Kedzie/36th.

Northbound buses will operate via Kedzie, 39th, California, I-55 Expressway and Kedzie.

Southbound buses will operate via Kedzie, 36th, California and 39th.

Allow extra travel time.
